comment: We need to track down every immigration lawyer who supports Democrats and ensure they are not aiding and abetting these caravans. If they are, arrest them for treason.
amr:
# ::snt We need to track down every immigration lawyer who supports Democrats and ensure they are not aiding and abetting these caravans. If they are, arrest them for treason.
(m / multi-sentence
      :snt1 (n / need-01
            :ARG0 (w / we)
            :ARG1 (a / and
                  :op1 (t / track-down-02
                        :ARG0 w
                        :ARG1 (l / lawyer
                              :mod (ii / immigrate-01)
                              :mod (e / every)
                              :ARG0-of (s / support-01
                                    :ARG1 (p / person
                                          :ARG0-of (h / have-org-role-91
                                                :ARG1 (p2 / political-party
                                                      :name (n2 / name
                                                            :op1 "Democrat")))))))
                  :op2 (e2 / ensure-01
                        :ARG0 w
                        :ARG1 (a2 / and
                              :polarity -
                              :op1 (a3 / aid-01
                                    :ARG0 l
                                    :ARG1 (c / caravana
                                          :mod (t2 / this)))
                              :op2 (a4 / abet-01
                                    :ARG0 l
                                    :ARG1 c)))))
      :snt2 (a5 / arrest-01
            :mode imperative
            :ARG0 (y / you)
            :ARG1 (t3 / they)
            :ARG2 (t4 / treason)
            :condition t3))
